tool_description:
Drillster is an open cloud based memorization platform that helps users learn more in less time. Use our API to integrate with Drillster or to create your own memorization solution.

For detailed information about this API, please refer to http://www.drillster.com/info/api-2/.
name: Drillster 2.0
title: Drillster 2.0

api_list.name: Get account access
api_list.description: Requests an organization login.

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: User ID

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drillster2.p.rapidapi.com/access/yKscUgpDShWKaf6zCLjyZw"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drillster2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://drillster2.p.rapidapi.com/access/{user_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drillster2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.name: Spelling Bee 2012 practice words (1/10)
test_endpoint.subject: English

license.text: Op deze drill is een Creative Commons Licentie van toepassing

api_list.name: Retrieve group members
api_list.description: Retrieves all members of a specific group.

api_list.name: Retrieve group drills
api_list.description: Retrieves all drills of a specific group. These can be regular drills, and courses. A course is a collection of (regular) drills.

required_parameters.name: group_id
required_parameters.description: The unique ID of the group

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search in Drill Store
api_list.description: Search the Drill Store for available drills and courses.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query

optional_parameters.name: searchField
optional_parameters.description: Specifies which fields will be searched. Can be included multiple times to specify multiple search fields. If not specified, all available fields will be searched.

optional_parameters.name: resultStart
optional_parameters.description: The index number (zero-based) of the first drill (or course) to include in the result. Use this parameter, in combination with resultSize, to apply pagination of the result; it will limit the number of drills included in the result. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: resultSize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of drills (or courses) to include in the result. If not specified, the results for all (remaining) drills are returned.

api_list.name: Retrieve test question
api_list.description: Returns the next question for a predefined test.

api_list.name: Search in repertoire
api_list.description: Retrieves the user's repertoire, or searches in it using a search query.

required_parameters.name: sortDirection
required_parameters.description: The sort direction (ascending or descending), if a sortField has been specified. If omitted, a default sort direction is used, which depends on the sortField. Possible values are: ASC, DESC.

optional_parameters.name: resultSize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of drills (or courses) to include in the result. If not specified, the results for all (remaining) drills are returned.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: The text to search for. It can be a single word, or multiple words (separated with a space). The search is case-insensitive. If multiple words are specified, the default search behavior is to search for any of the words. The AND operator can be used to search for all words, e.g. "milk AND butter". Note that the AND operator must be in capitals.

optional_parameters.name: searchField
optional_parameters.description: Specifies which fields will be searched. Can be included multiple times to specify multiple search fields. If not specified, all available fields will be searched. Possible values are:  NAME, DESCRIPTION, SUBJECT, TAGS, CONTENTS.

optional_parameters.name: resultStart
optional_parameters.description: The index number (zero-based) of the first drill (or course) to include in the result. Use this parameter, in combination with resultSize, to apply pagination of the result; it will limit the number of drills included in the result. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: sortField
optional_parameters.description: The field to sort the result by.

api_list.name: Retrieve test result
api_list.description: Retrieves an individual test result for a specific test instance.

required_parameters.name: test_id
required_parameters.description: The unique ID for the test definition

required_parameters.name: user_id_or_ticket
required_parameters.description: The user ID to retrieve the test results for, or in the case of an anonymous test, the test ticket

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drillster2.p.rapidapi.com/test-result/7OuHq7RcQOCsnGWR58TnBw/jK8TJ11kcA7YvqUhd873kJ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drillster2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://drillster2.p.rapidapi.com/test-result/{test_id}/{user_id_or_ticket}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drillster2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Define group objective
api_list.description: Defines a new practice objective for a group.

required_parameters.name: objectiveType
required_parameters.description: The type of the practice objective. Permitted values are: ONEOFF, PERMANENT.

required_parameters.name: mininumProficiency
required_parameters.description: The minimum proficiency to achieve or retain (0-100).

required_parameters.name: reviewDate
required_parameters.description: The review date for the practice objective (ISO 8601). The date must be in the future.

required_parameters.name: drill
required_parameters.description: The drill(s) to define the objective for. Courses can also be specified, by their respective codes. This parameter can be repeated to configure multiple drills or courses for the objective.

required_parameters.name: group_id
required_parameters.description: The unique ID for the group

optional_parameters.name: message
optional_parameters.description: The message(s) you would like the users to receive. The reminder messages can only be configured for ONEOFF practice objectives. This parameter can be repeated to configure multiple messages. Permitted values are:  STARTUP, 1ST_REMINDER, 2ND_REMINDER.

api_list.name: Create new drill
api_list.description: Creates a new and empty drill.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the newly created drill

required_parameters.name: subject
required_parameters.description: The subject matter of the drill

required_parameters.name: description
required_parameters.description: A description of the drill
required_parameters.default: Contains the idiom list from chapter 1 of the book French Made Easy.

api_list.name: Create basic user account
api_list.description: Creates a new (basic) user account.

required_parameters.name: emailAddress
required_parameters.description: The user's email address

required_parameters.name: realName
required_parameters.description: The full name of the user

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The preferred language of the user

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: The gender of the user

optional_parameters.name: yearOfBirth
optional_parameters.description: The year of birth of the user, expressed in four digits

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description: The time zone that the user resides in

api_list.name: Modify practice preferences
api_list.description: Modifies the user's practice preferences for the specified drill.

required_parameters.name: drill_id
required_parameters.description: The unique ID of the drill

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: The user's preferred practice direction

optional_parameters.name: style
optional_parameters.description: The user's preferred practice style

optional_parameters.name: useIntroductions
optional_parameters.description: The user's preference for introductions

optional_parameters.name: unknownColumn
optional_parameters.description: The name of the unknown column to include. This parameter can be specified multiple times to include more than one unknown column.

api_list.name: Update user
api_list.description: Updates specific user details. Users can only update their own user account, not the account of others.

required_parameters.name: biography
required_parameters.description: A brief biography or description of the user
required_parameters.default: I use Drillster to brush up on my language skills

optional_parameters.name: real_name
optional_parameters.description: The full name of the user

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The preferred locale of the user

optional_parameters.name: time_zone
optional_parameters.description: The time zone the user resides in

api_list.name: Create new group
api_list.description: Creates a new group. The group is created empty – it will have no drills or members.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the newly created group.

required_parameters.name: description
required_parameters.description: A description of the group.
required_parameters.default: Contains all of the students of the class of 2013.

api_list.name: Create course
api_list.description: Creates a new and empty course

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the newly created course

required_parameters.name: description
required_parameters.description: A description of the course
required_parameters.default: Contains the idiom list from chapters 1 through 12 of the book French Made Easy.

api_list.name: Obtain account upgrade
api_list.description: Upgrades a basic user account to a premium account.

required_parameters.name: payment_provider
required_parameters.description: The entity providing the payment for the account upgrade. May be "DRILLSTER", "APPLE" or "GOOGLE".

required_parameters.name: payment_key
required_parameters.description: The code that is proof of payment.

api_list.name: Obtain password reset email
api_list.description: Sends a change password email to a user.

required_parameters.name: email_address
required_parameters.description: The user's email address

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drillster2.p.rapidapi.com/user/thomas@example.com/request-password-change"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drillster2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Update drill details
api_list.description: Updates specific drill details.

required_parameters.name: drill_id

optional_parameters.name: name
